text:
Disable WinRE:
reagentc /disable 
KB5034441 is not on WSUS nor on MS catalog!? 
Our 23H2 installed with the latest 12/2023 image has a 300MB WinRE partition and
patches just fine (WinRE disabled from the start). 
Markus 
Am 10/01/2024 um 13:35 schrieb sarath kumar g c:
%40univie.ac.at

metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] You may hit a 0x80070643 - ERROR_INSTALL_FAILURE

important [https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification]
